content: this is an entire free halloween crochet set in this set is the following * ghost advent calendar 1 * pumpkin amigurumi 2 * candy corn amigrumi 3 * bat amigurumi 4 * costume kids amigurumi unicorn pumpkin and devil 5 to see each one please visit the blog post 6 about the set and click on which pattern you want to see to start making it you can also purchase an individual pdf or the entire halloween set pdf 7 1 https //stringydingding com/ghost-advent-calendar-free-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //stringydingding com/pumpkin-amigurumi-free-crochet-pattern/ 3 https //stringydingding com/candy-corn-food-friends-free-crochet-pattern/ 4 https //stringydingding com/bat-halloween-amigurumi-free-crochet-pattern/ 5 https //stringydingding com/halloween-costume-kids-amigurumi-free-crochet-pattern/ 6 https //stringydingding com/an-entire-free-halloween-amigurumi-set/ 7 https //stringydingding com/product/halloween-bundle-pdf/
